attributes.action: Allow pubs and clubs the right to allow smoking if they wish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am an ex-smoker but i think that a total ban on smoking in pubs and clubs is ludicrous. people should be given the choice therfore a pub/club should either be smoking or non-smoking.
Ventilation systems won't work as smoke travels so seperate them give the pubs/clubs either smoking or non-smoking liscences that way people can choose whether to go there and people can choose if they want to work there.
freedom of choice should be paramount in ths instance.
jobs will be lost places will close give people the right to choose for themselves and not be governed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
